resources.string:
"Supported functions and operators: 
" " Addition: 2 + 2
" " Subtraction: 2 - 2
" " Multiplication: 2 * 2
" " Division: 2 / 2
" " Exponentation: 2 ^ 2
" " Unary Minus: -2
" " Modulo: 2 % 2
" " Factorial: 2!
" " acos: arc cosine
" " asin: arc sine
" " atan: arc tangent
" " cos: cosine
" " cosh: hyperbolic cosine
" " exp: e^x
" " log: logarithm (base e)
" " log10: logarithm (base 10)
" " log2: logarithm (base 2)
" " sin: sine
" " sinh: hyperbolic sine
" " sqrt: square root
" " tan: tangent
" " tanh: hyperbolic tangent
"
